mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent_Id", a.materialname AS "materialname", a.inspectionmode AS "inspectionmode", a.ingredient AS "ingredient", a.granularity AS "granularity", a.appearance AS "appearance", a.status AS "status", a.size AS "size", a.remarks as "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN account_inspection b ON b.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select: SELECT *FROM account_inspection a LEFT JOIN account_inspection_detail b ON a.orderNum=b.orderNum where a.orderNum=#{orderNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_inspection_detail( id, parent_id, materialname, inspectionmode, ingredient, granularity, appearance, size, status, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent_Id}, #{materialname}, #{inspectionmode}, #{ingredient}, #{granularity}, #{appearance}, #{size}, #{status}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account_inspection_detail SET parent_id = #{parent_Id}, size = #{size}, materialname = #{materialname}, inspectionmode = #{inspectionmode}, ingredient = #{ingredient}, granularity = #{granularity}, appearance = #{appearance}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE account_inspection_detail SET
inspectionmode = #{inspectionmode},
ingredient = #{ingredient},
granularity = #{granularity},
appearance = #{appearance},
status = #{status},
remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
